attributes.action: Stop The Premier League from playing matches abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Football, once the working man's game, has today announced it is one step nearer to being whored across the world for television, merchandising, marketing and most of all money.

Where once friends, families and communities stood and sat together to watch football, we could soon see our top clubs playing thousands of miles away, in front of fans who know nothing of them, all because of the greed of a select few men and women who literally bought into the game at the right time.

This must be stopped. Domestic English football belongs, more than any other pursuit or event, to the English people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
